title: Google releases Gemini 3 AI, says it is most intelligent AI so far with depth and nuance like humans
description: Given how solid and remarkable Gemini 2.5 has been so far, expectations are running high from Gemini 3. Well, Google is today releasing its new AI model and it seems that Gemini 3 is indeed smart and good enough to beat the current state-of-the-art AI models such as ChatGPT 5 and Grok 4. Announcing ...
